mapper.select: select af.id, af.name, af.parent_id, af.parent from all_fields af order by af.parent, af.name

select f.id, t.name, f.road_image, f.satellite_image , t.c1_lat, t.c1_long, t.c2_lat, t.c2_long , t.description, t.tag_type_code, t.active , af.parent_id, af.parent from field f join tag t on f.id = t.id join all_fields af on f.id = af.id where f.id = #{parm1}

select f.id, t.name, f.road_image, f.satellite_image , t.c1_lat, t.c1_long, t.c2_lat, t.c2_long , t.description, t.tag_type_code, t.active from field f join tag t on f.id = t.id where t.name = #{parm1}

select tk.id tag_id, ttk.name, ail.zero_value, ail.max_value , trt.level, trt.level_text, coalesce(anl.code,"NORM") level_alarm , coalesce(anl.color,"darkgreen") level_color , trt.temp, trt.temp_text, coalesce(ant.code,"NORM") temp_alarm , coalesce(ant.color,"darkgreen") temp_color , ttk.c1_lat, ttk.c1_long, ttk.c2_lat, ttk.c2_long from field_tag_deep_vw ftv join tank tk on ftv.child_tag_id = tk.id join tag ttk on ftv.child_tag_id = ttk.id join tag tf on ftv.field_tag_id = tf.id join tank_ref_tag_vw trt on ftv.child_tag_id = trt.id join analog_input ail on trt.level_tag_id = ail.tag_id left outer join alarm_info anl on trt.level_tag_id = anl.tag_id left outer join alarm_info ant on trt.temp_tag_id = ant.tag_id where tf.name = #{parm1}
mapper.insert: insert Field ( id, satellite_image, road_image ) values( #{id}, #{satelliteImage}, #{roadImage})
